abstract: Profile of Western Oklahoma State baseball coach Kurt Russell, who has built a baseball juggernaut in Altus, continually replenishing a roster loaded with talented Latino players from the Northeast; Russell's baseball program has blossomed despite some initial hostility from the community, whose members were opposed to the junior-college's awarding scholarships to athletes out of the area.
snippet: Using his connections, Coach Kurt Russell has built a juggernaut at Western Oklahoma State College, often with overlooked Latino players from the Northeast.
lead_paragraph: Using his connections, Coach Kurt Russell has built a juggernaut at Western Oklahoma State College, often with overlooked Latino players from the Northeast.

headline.main: Latino Players Find Home on the Prairie
headline.print_headline: Latino Players Find Home on the Prairie
headline.seo: For Latino Baseball Players in Northeast, an Opportunity in Oklahoma
